the problem was that the Catagory class could only compare itself to other Catagory instances, even though the children displayed in the TreeViewer in the view could be both Catagories and IdentifiableDelegates.  So, when they were being sorted for display and the Catagory compare method was called it tried to cast everything to a Catagory, which then failed when something other than a Catagory was present.
